Interactive Twelvefold Way

Twelvefold Way is a systematic classification of twelve formulas relating to two finite sets in Combinatorics.

Instructions: Click and hold a ball to drag it. You must place it in a bin in order for that ball to count. Press submit when you place all the balls in the bins.

Your goal is to find all partitions for a given problem. If you get stuck on a problem, refer to hints and more info!

If you want to change formulas, please refer to the grid at the bottom of the screen.

Partition History
